content: Go to: Get your very own PayPal.Me linkPost it. Text it. Tag it. Share it. Shout it. And let your friends pay you back in a tap or two. Grab your PayPal.Me…www.paypal.me Set up an account. Put in the link to your profile… Pay Oliver Brainerd using PayPal.MeGo to paypal.me/olivershiny and type in the amount. Since it's PayPal, it's easy and secure. Don't have a PayPal…www.paypal.me Do it.
